class.name: DojoSessionAccount
class.brief_description: A class representing a Dojo session account.
class.description: The DojoSessionAccount class manages session-based accounts, allowing for temporary access with specific policies and expiration times.

method.name: create_from_subscribe
method.description: Creates a session account from a subscription.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes a list of calls using the session account.

method.name: execute_from_outside
method.description: Executes a list of calls from outside the session context.

method.name: execute_from_outside_raw
method.description: Executes a raw call from outside the session context.

method.name: execute_raw
method.description: Executes a raw call using the session account.

method.name: generate_session_request_url
method.description: Generates a URL for requesting a new session.

method.name: get_address
method.description: Returns the address of the session account.

method.name: get_chain_id
method.description: Returns the chain ID associated with the session account.

method.name: get_expires_at
method.description: Returns the expiration timestamp of the session.

method.name: get_info
method.description: Returns a dictionary containing information about the session account.

method.name: is_expired
method.description: Checks if the session has expired.

method.name: is_revoked
method.description: Checks if the session has been revoked.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Checks if the session account is valid.

members.member: The maximum fee allowed for transactions.
